definitions.definition: A small showy ornament or piece of jewelry
definitions.example: That little trinket around her neck must have cost a bundle.

definitions.definition: A thing of little value; a trifle; a toy.
definitions.example: It's only a little trinket, but it reminds her of him.

definitions.definition: A three-cornered sail formerly carried on a ship's foremast, probably on a lateen yard.
To give trinkets; to court favour.
